Their light designs have become an inseparable part of our identity. We are talking about our resident light artists, Lumus Instruments, who roam the audiovisual landscape and bridge the region where installation art meets stage design. Through their work, they explore synergetic design principles within the artistic landscape. It shapes the physicality of refined digital systems and investigates how these systems affect our perception of space and time.

The design for ADE used custom-built luminaires that interacted with two lasers, creating a minimalist-futuristic sculpture floating above the dance floor. 

We can't wait to see what else they have in store for us in the future!
